aka: FCK 2020 - 2 and Half Years With Scooter
Hyper, Hyper - H.P. Baxxter und Scooter

director.name: 考度拉·卡布里茨-珀斯特 Cordula Kablitz-Post

trans_title: FCK 2020 - 2 and Half Years With Scooter
Hyper, Hyper - H.P. Baxxter und Scooter
introduction: There was a time when this techno band was the most distinctive German band in the world. What was once funfair music is today a cultish 30-million-record-selling phenomenon. With slogans like "Hyper! Hyper!" and "How much is the Fish?", Scooter became internationally known – including in Estonia. And indeed, the film shows a pivotal scene of success for the band and fans alike...
